comments.en:
This driver is a GPL DeskJet 2200 driver provided by HP (!). It's based on Uli and Matthew's cdj850 and cdj880 drivers, with a new front-end to speak the different RGB-encoded PCL flavor used by these printers.

The provided source is for gs 6.01; it probably works against anything at all recent. It is also contained in ESP GhostScript 7.07, 8.15, and later. So all distributions using these GhostScript versions and perhaps also others will ship this driver.

After getting a tip from the driver's author I (Till) succeeded to compile it for GNU GhostScript 5.50. You must copy the function "gdev_pcl_mode9compress" from the gdevcd8.c file of the cdj880 driver into the end of the gdevcd8.c of HP's "chp2200" driver. Then you follow the instructions in HP's source package and GhostScript will compile.

(Former) Maintainer: siow-kiat_tan-at-hp.com.
This driver does only 600x600, not 1200x600 in presentation quality.
This driver published by HP under the GPL (!) sends RGB data to the printer. This makes the printer transferring the data to CMYK by itself and so it gives a colour quality as good as under Windows.
This driver published by HP under the GPL (!) sends RGB data to the printer. This makes the printer transferring the data to CMYK by itself and so it gives a colour quality as good as under Windows.
